  • Product Details

  • Round toed
column26:
off white and brown casual shoes with Velcro closure and low top styling
Combination construction delivers stability in the heel and flexibility in the forefoot
Full-grain leather and mesh upper and breathable mesh lining treated with Aegis
EVA removable footbed and moulded nylon arch shank
Compression moulded EVA foot-frame for stability and comfort
Merrell QForm comfort midsole
Merrell air cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability
1.0mm sole lug depth
Merrell Lorelei Sole/ sticky rubber outsole with grooves and pivot point at forefoot
Approximate weight: 397 grams
Warranty: 180 days against manufacturing defects

Aegis Microbe Shield: While some antimicrobial treatments block odour
column27: Aegis takes a more aggressive approach
column28: with an onslaught of polymer spikes that rupture the cell walls of odourproducing microbes that stops odour in its tracks. Unlike chemicals that can wear down or produce resistant super bacteria
column30: won't leech out despite repeated washings
column31:
and won't harm the environment.

QFOrM Comfort: It's a fact that women are anatomically and biomechanically different from men. Unfortunately
column32: these differences are all-too-often ignored. Working with Sport Biomechanics
column35: Merrell spent years studying how these differences contributed to discomfort and in some cases injury for women wearing men's shoes. So they specifically engineered the midsoles in their Women's shoes to provide the proper support
column37: and corrective positioning women need to make possible a more balanced
column38:
natural stride that ensures longer-lasting comfort and reduced wear for each shoe.

  • Material & Care

  • Leather and mesh
